title: 148862704.the Alligorical Recluse
excerpt: If you're not careful, you can create a whole life around avoiding the things that you don't want to feel.

children.text: If you're not careful, you can create a whole life around avoiding the things that you don't want to feel.
Which would ordinarily be fine, with one exception.
Living in a figurative box is often just as restrictive and monotonous as living in a real one.
